Page for Terms and Conditions link

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to your first checkout page dropdown.

To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/support/settings/general/tell-my-script-where-to-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
